channel.title: [508]TokkulScape 508 V3.5 FIXED![508] OVER 16K DOWNLOADS TOTAL!
channel.description:
[B][SIZE=5]VIDEOS[/B] NEW CAPE EMOTES TO COME! [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmX1xyJqFjI]Death and Member Cape Emotes[/URL] MY JAIL SYSTEM FOR V2 SOURCE! [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DsvKDcXQpjg]Jail System[/URL] MY DRAGONFIRE SHIELD OPERATE! ON PLAYERS ONLY [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rireWCKYBZM]Dragonfire Shield Operate[/URL] MY DRAGON CLAWS SPECIAL FIXED FOR PALYERS [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3cLxjWek2QE]Dragon Claw Special[/URL] MY PK POINTS SYSTEM! [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TR5cHW6H0Yk]Pk Points[/URL]
[B]SOME OF V1.5 UPDATES[/B]
[ul][*]Took out exp lamp [*]Took out event area [*]Took out white mask from shop and replaced it. [*]Made berets wearable [*]Added Berets to the shops [*]Made ::master ::pure ::modarmor ::cash for mod+ [*]Added Oblesik for training summoning! But most go someplace like edgeville to train it, I'll show picture bellow. But most wait 6-10 seconds inbetween! [*]Blouse's now wearable! [*]Changed the monster's that are summoned out! They are now attackable! [*]Giving them each they're own amount of hp and attack! [*]Changed Starter, auto 50 range when you log in. [*]Fixed some glitchs/bugs [*]Fixed some drop rates [*]Added 100% Spirit Beast Attackable! [*]100% Spirit Beast area with drops! Must have decent prayer in order to fight it! And should fight in group (Very Powerful)! They re-spawn every 210 seconds, three minutes and 30 seconds in between, give you time to get more food and get ready for another battle! [*]Added 100% Prayer potion drinking, re-heals your prayer! And they're added into potion shop in edgeville! [*]New Sweet Shop [*]All sweets are 100% Working, different ones heal different amount, some heal 3 some heal 4. [*]All sweets are stackable! [*]100% Magic Potions, in Potion Shop now too! [*]Saradomin Special now heals prayer and hitpoints when special is used on npcs! [*]Added 100% custom teleports by magic tab! [*]Added a new part to yell system, updated! [*]New Mutant Tarn Area! [*]New items in pk shop! [*]Can't walk away while banking/trading [*]Took out Santa from shop.[/ul]
[B]SOME OF V2 UPDATES[/B]
[ul][*]Working Trade!! [*]Working Bank Note!! [*]Working Jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute! [*]Working rep and pk points system! [*]Working Kc and new Safety Dungeon System! [*]Added some things to shops. [*]More custom items added [*]Membership added [*]Slightly better pking system [*]Granite Maul Special added! [*]Temp muted only works about 60% [*]New Client items, updated a little bit, girls can now be seen wearing some items slightly. [*]Client auto directs you to server! [*]More commands! [*]New member items only! [*]Pure command fixed! [*]Fixed some other commands and much much more![/ul]
[B]V2.5 UPDATES[/B]
[ul][*]Fixed dragonfire shield timer/mute timer [*]Added ban timer [*]Added a mail command, gives some main information or announcments. [*]Edited drops [*]Correct stats for custom items [*]Vesta special, saradomin sword special, Dragon godsword special [*]Two new cape emotes. [*]More commands... [*]Can't remember rest... So just enjoy :D[/ul]
[b]Okay well I noticed that some topics in here have like a features thing so I'm a just post some features[b]
[b]Features List[/b]
[ul][*]100% working godwars [*]95% working pots and sweets [*]Tons of train areas [*]Working jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute system! [*]All skills work! [*]Low combat training xp - makes it more interesting [*]Working dragonfire shield special [*]Quest tab teleports [*]Working trade [*]Working bank notes [*]Safety Dungeon Mini Game [*]Almost all specials work [*]Some what working pk point system [*]Working rep system [*]Membership rank, items, and area. [*]Most items require stats to wear (Those that need it)[/ul]
[b]Version 3.5 Source Links[/b] Uppit Source - [url=http://uppit.com/v/NQGQRL8W]Uppit Source Link[/url] MegaUpload Source - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JPTKZQB2]MegaUpload Source Link[/url] MegaUpload Client - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WTMF4I52]MegaUpload Client[/url]
[SIZE=3]~ Normal Commands ~[/SIZE] ::white ::train ::train2 ::train3 ::train4 ::elfzone ::suggest (Your suggestion) ::reportabuse (Username) (What they did) ::friends ::ignore ::ghostzone ::revive ::ge ::home ::shops ::kbd ::yell (Your message) ::stafflist ::edge ::dragons ::bounty ::bandos ::armadyl ::zamorak ::saradomin ::godwars ::cwars ::clanwars ::barrows ::male ::female ::dangerus ::tokkulwar ::party ::mithril ::sellegg ::sellegg2 ::sellwhip ::sellwhip2 ::sellsanta ::sellsanta2 ::chill ::frozen ::wyvern ::jad ::funzone ::bandits ::commands ::lunar ::ancients ::modern ::spiritbeast ::char ::hair :hair2 ::myinfo ::rep (username) ::skull That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
[SIZE=3]~Member Commands~[/SIZE] ::memberzone That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
[SIZE=3]~Moderator Commands~[/SIZE] All of the Normal player commands and these. ::mcommands ::master ::pure ::cash ::modarmor ::modzone ::stafftrain ::purearmor ::mcommands2 ::addblackmark ::checkblackmark ::removeblackmark ::blackmark5 ::blackmark6 ::blackmark7 ::blackmark8 ::blackmark9 That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
[SIZE=3]~Administrator Commands~[/SIZE] All of the Normal and Moderator player Commands and these. ::pkskull ::pkskull2 ::pkskull3 ::pkskull4 ::pkskull5 ::pkskull6 ::pkskull7 ::pkskull8 ::kick (username) ::pnpc (Npc Id) ::unpnpc ::anger ::void ::adminzone ::adminarmor ::bandosarmor ::xrichie ::ring ::logout ::armadylarmor ::master ::partyhats ::rares ::masks ::food ::npc (npc id) ::santa ::godswords ::hoods ::capes1 ::capes2 ::gloves ::bank ::pouches ::showinterface (interface id) ::gfx (gfx id) ::emote (emote id) ::tele (X-Coord) (Y-Coord) (Height) ::rebuildnpclist ::restorestats ::run ::spc ::emptyspecial ::coords ::teletome (username) ::teleto (username) ::dplate ::deathcape ::dclaws ::ban (username) ::unban (username) ::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::maxsd ::maxrep ::jail (username) ::unjail (username) ::fullkc That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
[SIZE=3]~Owner Commands~[/SIZE] All of the Normal, Moderator, and Administrator Commands and these. ::givemod ::giveadmin ::demote ::getpass (username) ::alltome ::saveall ::bow ::gay ::gayall ::hailchris ::creepy ::maxcash (username) ::skull (username) ::skull2 (username) ::skull3 (username) ::skull4 (username) ::skull5 (username) ::skull6 (username) ::skull7 (username) ::skull8 (username) ::bgs (username) ::sgs (username) ::zgs (username) ::ags (username) ::ss (username) ::phat (username) ::phat2 (username) ::phat3 (username) ::phat4 (username) ::phat5 (username) ::phat6 (username) ::santa (username) ::void (username) ::godswords (username) ::fullphat (username) ::stop (username) ::trainuser (username) ::backuper ::clangame ::giveall (item id, amount), ::givemember (username) ::removemember (username) ::spam (username) ::killall That's all for now.. You can add more if you want.
As you can see the commands haven't really changed much...

item.title: [508]TokkulScape 508 V3.5 FIXED![508] OVER 16K DOWNLOADS TOTAL!
item.dc:creator: @DivineScape DivineScape
item.description:
@DivineScape wrote:

[SIZE=5]VIDEOS
NEW CAPE EMOTES TO COME! Death and Member Cape Emotes
MY JAIL SYSTEM FOR V2 SOURCE! Jail System
MY DRAGONFIRE SHIELD OPERATE! ON PLAYERS ONLY Dragonfire Shield Operate
MY DRAGON CLAWS SPECIAL FIXED FOR PALYERS Dragon Claw Special
MY PK POINTS SYSTEM! Pk Points

SOME OF V1.5 UPDATES

[ul][]Took out exp lamp
[]Took out event area
[]Took out white mask from shop and replaced it.
[]Made berets wearable
[]Added Berets to the shops
[]Made ::master ::pure ::modarmor ::cash for mod+
[]Added Oblesik for training summoning! But most go someplace like edgeville to train it, I’ll show picture bellow. But most wait 6-10 seconds inbetween!
[]Blouse’s now wearable!
[]Changed the monster’s that are summoned out! They are now attackable!
[]Giving them each they’re own amount of hp and attack!
[]Changed Starter, auto 50 range when you log in.
[]Fixed some glitchs/bugs
[]Fixed some drop rates
[]Added 100% Spirit Beast Attackable!
[]100% Spirit Beast area with drops! Must have decent prayer in order to fight it! And should fight in group (Very Powerful)! They re-spawn every 210 seconds, three minutes and 30 seconds in between, give you time to get more food and get ready for another battle!
[]Added 100% Prayer potion drinking, re-heals your prayer! And they’re added into potion shop in edgeville!
[]New Sweet Shop
[]All sweets are 100% Working, different ones heal different amount, some heal 3 some heal 4.
[]All sweets are stackable!
[]100% Magic Potions, in Potion Shop now too!
[]Saradomin Special now heals prayer and hitpoints when special is used on npcs!
[]Added 100% custom teleports by magic tab!
[]Added a new part to yell system, updated!
[]New Mutant Tarn Area!
[]New items in pk shop!
[]Can’t walk away while banking/trading
[*]Took out Santa from shop.[/ul]

SOME OF V2 UPDATES

[ul][]Working Trade!!
[]Working Bank Note!!
[]Working Jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute!
[]Working rep and pk points system!
[]Working Kc and new Safety Dungeon System!
[]Added some things to shops.
[]More custom items added
[]Membership added
[]Slightly better pking system
[]Granite Maul Special added!
[]Temp muted only works about 60%
[]New Client items, updated a little bit, girls can now be seen wearing some items slightly.
[]Client auto directs you to server!
[]More commands!
[]New member items only!
[]Pure command fixed!
[*]Fixed some other commands and much much more![/ul]

V2.5 UPDATES

[ul][]Fixed dragonfire shield timer/mute timer
[]Added ban timer
[]Added a mail command, gives some main information or announcments.
[]Edited drops
[]Correct stats for custom items
[]Vesta special, saradomin sword special, Dragon godsword special
[]Two new cape emotes.
[]More commands…
[*]Can’t remember rest… So just enjoy :D[/ul]

[b]Okay well I noticed that some topics in here have like a features thing so I’m a just post some features[b]

Features List

[ul][]100% working godwars
[]95% working pots and sweets
[]Tons of train areas
[]Working jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute system!
[]All skills work!
[]Low combat training xp - makes it more interesting
[]Working dragonfire shield special
[]Quest tab teleports
[]Working trade
[]Working bank notes
[]Safety Dungeon Mini Game
[]Almost all specials work
[]Some what working pk point system
[]Working rep system
[]Membership rank, items, and area.
[]Most items require stats to wear (Those that need it)[/ul]

Version 3.5 Source Links
Uppit Source - Uppit Source Link
MegaUpload Source - MegaUpload Source Link
MegaUpload Client - MegaUpload Client

[SIZE=3]~ Normal Commands ~[/SIZE]
::white ::train ::train2 ::train3 ::train4 ::elfzone ::suggest (Your suggestion)
::reportabuse (Username) (What they did) ::friends ::ignore ::ghostzone
::revive ::ge ::home ::shops ::kbd ::yell (Your message) ::stafflist ::edge
::dragons ::bounty ::bandos ::armadyl ::zamorak ::saradomin ::godwars
::cwars ::clanwars ::barrows ::male ::female ::dangerus ::tokkulwar
::party ::mithril ::sellegg ::sellegg2 ::sellwhip ::sellwhip2 ::sellsanta
::sellsanta2 ::chill ::frozen ::wyvern ::jad ::funzone ::bandits ::commands
::lunar ::ancients ::modern ::spiritbeast ::char ::hair :hair2 ::myinfo
::rep (username) ::skull
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

[SIZE=3]~Member Commands~[/SIZE]

That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.

[SIZE=3]~Moderator Commands~[/SIZE]
All of the Normal player commands and these.

::mcommands2 ::addblackmark ::checkblackmark ::removeblackmark ::blackmark5
::blackmark6 ::blackmark7 ::blackmark8 ::blackmark9

[SIZE=3]~Administrator Commands~[/SIZE]
All of the Normal and Moderator player Commands and these.
::pkskull ::pkskull2 ::pkskull3 ::pkskull4 ::pkskull5 ::pkskull6 ::pkskull7
::pkskull8 ::kick (username) ::pnpc (Npc Id) ::unpnpc ::anger ::void ::adminzone
::adminarmor ::bandosarmor ::xrichie ::ring ::logout
::armadylarmor ::master ::partyhats ::rares ::masks ::food ::npc (npc id)
::santa ::godswords ::hoods ::capes1 ::capes2 ::gloves ::bank
::pouches ::showinterface (interface id) ::gfx (gfx id) ::emote (emote id)
::tele (X-Coord) (Y-Coord) (Height) ::rebuildnpclist ::restorestats
::run ::spc ::emptyspecial ::coords ::teletome (username) ::teleto (username)
::dplate ::deathcape ::dclaws ::ban (username) ::unban (username)
::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::maxsd ::maxrep ::jail (username)
::unjail (username) ::fullkc
That’s all for now… You can add more if you want.
